casebody.data:
Stubbs, Appellee, v. Webb et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Stubbs v. Webb (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 300.]

No. 85-788 Decided December 22, 1986. Jack M. Lenavitt Co., L.P.A., and Jack M. Lenavitt, Mark L. Schumacher and Mark T. Rubright, for appellee. Fuller & Henry, Ray A. Farris and Sue A. Sikkema, for appellants.

The judgment in this cause, having been certified by the court of appeals in case No. L-84-343 as being in conflict with Wainstein v. Univ. Hospitals of Cleve. (Apr. 14, 1985), Cuyahoga App. No. 48788, unreported, is hereby affirmed on authority of Mominee v. Scherbarth (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 270.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
